document.full_text: the selection of auburn quarterback cam newton as first pick of the nfl draft was close to a sure thing, but the rest of thursday's first round selections included surprises and hiccups.
document.title: surprises and hiccups make for lively start to nfl draft
lines_and_colors: the selection of auburn quarterback cam newton as first pick of the nfl draft was close to a sure thing, but the rest of thursday's first round selections included surprises and hiccups.
